items.question: What city is this supposed to take place in? Is it Birmingham? Or do they ever say?
items.answer: The story is set in Birmingham and some of the exteriors show that city, but the city's name is never mentioned in the script, and the script seems to give the impression of just a generic English city other than London. Since the series is produced in Northern Ireland, many of the exteriors are actually in Belfast and vicinity.

items.question: Will there be a season six?
items.answer: According to the Radio Times, production of season six began in early 2020 but was suspended in April due to the coronovirus pandemic. Shooting was scheduled to resume sometime after September 1, but it is uncertain at this point (Sep 2020) when the series will be completed and aired

items.question: It's September 2021 and season 6 is available on BritBox. Will there be a season 7?
